All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
Representation of actions an agent can take.
Algorithm
Interface representing the algorithm used by the game.
App
Main class of the application
BrickNode
Represents a brick node on the grid.
CantMoveException
Raised if the node cannot move.
EmptyNode
Represents an empty node on the grid.
FFN
Feedforward neural network.
GameStats
Representation for post game information.
GraphicsMain
Class with the main method, contains all the setup.
GraphicsView
GUI representation of the game.
Grid
Representation of the 2048 grid, in which nodes reside.
GridManager
History of a Grid instance, going back to its initial state
Heuristic
Enum to represent types of lookahead heuristic functions.
InvalidActionException
Raised when an invalid action is specified.
InvalidMapSizeException
Raised when the specified map has an invalid size.
InvalidMapSymbolException
Raised when an unknown symbol is specified.
InvalidNumberOfGamesException
Raised when an invalid number of games has been specified.
InvalidValueException
Raised when an invalid value is specified.
Layer
Neural network layer.
LayerCache
Saves an instance of a Layer.
LayerGrad
Layer parameter derivitives.
Lookahead
Lookahead 2048 algorithm.
LookaheadStrand
A possibility strand to be processed by a thread.
MapStorage
Hash table model storage.
ModelStorage
Requirements of the model storage objects.
MutableFloat
Mutable version of the java Float class.
Node
Abstract class for the node object.
NodeType
Types of nodes that exist within the grid.
NoFutureGridException
Raised when the redo operation attempts to access an empty buffer.
NoMergeFlagException
Raised if the node does not have a move flag.
NoMoveFlagException
Raised if the node does not have a move flag.
NoValueException
Raised if an invalid value is specified.
Pair<A,B>
Tuple of two arbitary objects.
PlayerAlgo
Handles human player input actions.
Position
Represents an index within the grid.
ReinLearn
Reinforcement Algorithm.
SQLStorage
SQL database model storage.
StdoutView
The CLI interface.
ThreadedLookahead
Threaded lookahead.
TreeDFSNode
A Depth First Search node in the abstract DAG of instances.
TreeGeneratorMDP
Responsible for processing the DAG of instances generated from the initial node and creating the optimal model to play the game.
Triplet<A,B,C>
Tuple of three arbitary objects.
UniformRandomPlay
Plays the game by performing random actions from a uniform distribution.
UnknownAlgorithmException
Raised if an unknown algorithm is specified.
UnknownArgumentException
Raised if an unknown argument is specified.
UnknownHeuristicException
Raised when an invalid heuristic is specified.
UnknownNodeTypeException
Raised if an unknown node type is specified.
ValueNode
Represents an node with a value on the grid.
View
Interface for user interfaces (no pun intended).
